lines.i: Information about the location of the unit when dispatched

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.96"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10613)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Dispatch Location Name (CONF:10616)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Dispatch Location Name (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.150)

This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Dispatch Location Latitude (CONF:10619)

Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type x_ActClassDocumentEntryOrganizer

body.codeblock: <organizer xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.96"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="2099880107"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2014"/> <high value="2014"/> </effectiveTime> <component> <templateId root="null"/> <observation> <code code="1728619046"/> <value xsi:type="ST">TEXT FOR VALUE</value> </observation> </component> <component> <templateId root="null"/> <observation> <code code="834543770"/> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation> </component> <component> <templateId root="null"/> <observation> <code code="761251478"/> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation> </component> </organizer>
